titles: The marrow of ecclesiastical history contained in the lives of one hundred forty eight fathers, schoolmen, first reformers and modern divines which have flourished in the Church since Christ's time to this present age : faithfully collected and orderly disposed according to the centuries wherein they lived, together with the lively effigies of most of the eminentest of them cut in copper / by Samuel Clark.
author: Clarke, Samuel, 1599-1682.
publisher: Printed for T.V. and are to be sold by William Roybould,
notes: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
